Variables
x
float x

Horizontal position on the screen.

<0, 1.0> = left to right

(-1.0, 0) = right to left

-1.0 = centered

y
float y

Vertical position on the screen.

<0, 1.0> = top to bottom

(-1.0, 0) = bottom to top

-1.0 = centered

effect
int effect

Effects.

0 : Fade In/Out

1 : Credits

2 : Scan Out

uint8 r1

Red 1

int channel

Channel. 1-4.
